item.title: αὐτός αὐτή αὐτό
item.field_greek_definition: him- her- itself etc. (for emphasis); the same (with article); (pron.) him, her, it etc. (in oblique cases)

item.title: εἰμί, ἔσομαι, impf. ἦν, infin. εἶναι
οὗτος αὕτη τοῦτο
item.field_greek_definition: this, these; μετὰ ταῦτα after this

item.title: ἤ
item.field_greek_definition: or; than (after a comparative); ἤ...ἤ either...or

item.title: μέν...δέ
item.field_greek_definition: on the one hand...on the other hand (often untranslated); μέν (by itself) indeed

item.title: τις τι
item.field_greek_definition: someone, something, anyone, anything, some, any (enclitic indef. pron./adj.)

item.title: λέγω, ἐρῶ, εἶπον, εἴρηκα, λέλεγμαι, ἐλέχθην and ἐρρήθην
item.field_greek_definition: say, speak (of), recount; pick up, collect, count

item.title: ὡς
item.field_greek_definition: as, since; (introducing purpose clause) so that (+subj./opt.); (introducing indir. statement) that

item.title: κατά
item.field_greek_definition: down, down (from or along), throughout, according to; κατὰ γῆν by land; κατὰ φύσιν in accordance with nature; κατ’ ἔθνη by nations; καθ᾿ἕνα one by one.

item.title: πρός
item.field_greek_definition: from the side of, in the presence of (+gen.); near, at, in addition to (+dat.); to, towards, in relation to (+acc.)

item.title: γίγνομαι, γενήσομαι, 2 aor. ἐγενόμην, γέγονα, γεγένημαι, ἐγενήθην
ἔχω, ἕξω or σχήσω, 2 aor. ἔσχον, ἔσχηκα, impf. εἶχον
πολύς πολλή πολύ
item.field_greek_definition: much, many; ὡς ἐπὶ τὸ πολύ for the most part

item.title: μή
item.field_greek_definition: not (marks the negative as subjective or conditional); εἰ μή if not, except

item.title: ὅστις ἥτις ὅ τι
item.field_greek_definition: anyone who, anything which; (in indir. quest.) who, which, what

item.title: ἄν
item.field_greek_definition: [marks verbs as potential (with optative), or generalizing (with subjunctive)]

item.title: εἰ
item.field_greek_definition: if (+indic. or opt.); εἴπερ if indeed

item.title: φημί, φήσω, impf. ἔφην
item.field_greek_definition: say, assert, declare; οὐ φημί deny, refuse, say that...not

item.title: ὑπό
item.field_greek_definition: under (+gen., dat.); by (+gen. of personal agent); down under (+acc.)

item.title: ποιέω, ποιήσω, ἐποίησα, πεποίηκα, πεποίημαι, ἐποιήθην
item.field_greek_definition: make, produce, cause, do; (mid.) consider, reckon

item.title: λόγος λόγου, ὁ
item.field_greek_definition: word, speech, discourse; thought, reason, account

item.title: παρά
item.field_greek_definition: from (+gen.); beside (+dat.); to, to the side of, contrary to (+acc.)

item.title: πρότερος προτέρα πρότερον
item.field_greek_definition: before, earlier; τὸ πρότερον previously, before

item.title: πρότερος προτέρα πρότερον
item.field_greek_definition: before, earlier; τὸ πρότερον previously, before

item.title: οὐδέ
item.field_greek_definition: and not, but not, nor; οὐδέ...οὐδέ not even...nor yet

item.title: ἐκεῖνος ἐκείνη ἐκεῖνο
item.field_greek_definition: that person or thing; ἐκεῖνος…οὗτος the former…the latter

item.title: εἶπον
item.field_greek_definition: I said, I spoke, 2 aor. → λέγω, φημί

item.title: γε
item.field_greek_definition: (enclitic) indeed; at least, at any rate

item.title: δή
item.field_greek_definition: surely, really, now, in fact, indeed (gives greater exactness)

item.title: ἵημι, ἥσω, ἧκα, -εἷκα, εἷμαι, -εἵθην
item.field_greek_definition: put in motion, let go, shoot; (mid.) hasten, rush

item.title: δέω, δεήσω, ἐδέησα, δεδέηκα, δεδέημαι, ἐδεήθην
item.field_greek_definition: lack, miss, stand in need of (+gen.)

item.title: ὁράω, ὄψομαι, 2 aor. εἶδον, ἑόρακα and ἑώρακα, ὤφθην, impf. ἑώρων
οἷος οἵα οἷον
item.field_greek_definition: such as, of what sort, like, (exclam.) what a!, how! ; οἷός τε (+infin.) fit or able to; οἷόν τε (+infin.) it is possible to

item.title: λαμβάνω, λήψομαι, ἔλαβον, εἴληφα, εἴλημμαι, ἐλήφθην
δοκέω, δόξω, ἔδοξα
item.field_greek_definition: think, suppose, imagine (+acc. and infin.); seem, seem good; (impers.) δοκεῖ μοι it seems to me

item.title: ὅσος ὅση ὅσον
item.field_greek_definition: however much; as great as; (in pl.) as many as; ὅσον (adv.) as much as

item.title: καλέω, καλῶ, ἐκάλεσα, κέκληκα, κέκλημαι, ἐκλήθην
δεῖ, δεήσει, impf. ἔδει
item.field_greek_definition: it is necessary, one must, one ought (+acc. and infin.)

item.title: δίδωμι, δώσω, ἔδωκα, δέδωκα, δέδομαι, ἐδόθην
δίδωμι, δώσω, ἔδωκα, δέδωκα, δέδομαι, ἐδόθην
φύσις φύσεως, ἡ
item.field_greek_definition: nature; (of the mind) one’s nature or disposition; regular order of nature

item.title: δύναμαι, δυνήσομαι, ἐδυνήθην, δεδύνημαι
item.field_greek_definition: (+infin.) to be able (to), be strong enough (to)

item.title: ὥστε
item.field_greek_definition: (introducing natural or actual result clause) so as, so that, (with the result) that

item.title: ἀρχή ἀρχῆς, ἡ
item.field_greek_definition: beginning, origin; rule, empire, realm; magistracy

item.title: φύω, φύσω, ἔφυσα
item.field_greek_definition: bring forth, produce, beget; 2 aor. ἔφυν grew, pf. πέφυκα be by nature
use, experience, suffer (+dat.); treat someone in a certain way (+dat. and adv.)

item.title: οἶδα, infin. εἰδέναι, imper. ἴσθι, plupf. used as impf. ᾔδειν
item.field_greek_definition: to know (pf. in pres. sense); to know how to (+infin.)
(+infin.) will, wish (to); be willing (to); ὁ βουλόμενος anyone who likes

item.title: φαίνω, φανῶ, ἔφηνα, πέφηνα, πέφασμαι, ἐφάνην
item.field_greek_definition: bring to light, make appear, make clear; (pass.) come to light, be seen, appear, appear to be (+ptc. or infin.)

item.title: γράφω, γράψω, ἔγραψα, γέγραφα, γέγραμμαι, ἐγράφην
φέρω, οἴσω, 1 aor. ἤνεγκα, 2 aor. ἤνεγκον, ἐνήνοχα, ἐνήνεγμαι, ἠνέχθην
item.field_greek_definition: carry, bring, fetch; carry off or away; φέρε come now, well

item.title: μάλιστα
item.field_greek_definition: most, most of all; (in replies) certainly
exist, be, belong to; τὰ ὑπάρχοντα existing circumstances

item.title: ποτε (enclitic)
item.field_greek_definition: at some time, ever, in the world

item.title: ἵνα
item.field_greek_definition: in order that (conj. +subj. or opt.); where (rel. adv. +indic.)

item.title: ἤδη
item.field_greek_definition: already, now (of the immediate past); presently (of the immediate future)

item.title: πατήρ πατρός, ὁ
item.field_greek_semantic_group: Family and Friendship and the Home

item.title: ἀκούω, ἀκούσομαι, ἤκουσα, ἀκήκοα, plup. ἠκηκόη or ἀκηκόη, ἠκούσθην
γένος γένους, τό
item.field_greek_semantic_group: Family and Friendship and the Home

item.title: πράσσω, πράξω, ἔπραξα, πέπραχα, πέπραγμαι, ἐπράχθην
item.field_greek_definition: do, achieve, accomplish; do or fare in a certain way (+adv.)

item.title: πράσσω, πράξω, ἔπραξα, πέπραχα, πέπραγμαι, ἐπράχθην
item.field_greek_definition: do, achieve, accomplish; do or fare in a certain way (+adv.)

item.title: πρῶτος πρώτη πρῶτον
item.field_greek_definition: first, foremost, earliest; (adv.) τὸ πρῶτον in the first place

item.title: εὑρίσκω, εὑρήσω, 2 aor. ηὗρον or εὗρον, ηὕρηκα or εὕρηκα, εὕρημαι, εὑρέθην
παῖς παιδός, ὁ/ἡ
item.field_greek_semantic_group: Family and Friendship and the Home

item.title: ἔρχομαι, fut. εἶμι or ἐλεύσομαι, 2 aor. ἦλθον, ἐλήλυθα
υἱός υἱοῦ, ὁ
item.field_greek_semantic_group: Family and Friendship and the Home

item.title: γιγνώσκω, γνώσομαι, ἔγνων, ἔγνωκα, ἔγνωσμαι, ἐγνώσθην
item.field_greek_definition: come to know, learn; judge, think, or determine that (+acc. and infin.)

item.title: τυγχάνω, τεύξομαι, ἔτυχον, τετύχηκα, τέτυγμαι, ἐτύχθην
item.field_greek_definition: hit, light upon, meet by chance (+gen.); reach, gain, obtain; happen to be (+ptc.)

item.title: ἵστημι στήσω will set, ἔστησα set, caused to stand, 2 aor. ἔστην stood, ἕστηκα stand, plup. εἱστήκη stood, ἐστάθην stood
ἅμα
item.field_greek_definition: at the same time; (prep.) together with (+dat.)

item.title: ἄγω, ἄξω, ἤγαγον, ἦχα, ἦγμαι, ἤχθην
τρόπος τρόπου, ὁ
item.field_greek_definition: way, manner, fashion; way of life, habit, custom

item.title: μέσος μέση μέσον
item.field_greek_definition: middle, in the middle, moderate; τὸ μέσον midst

item.title: ἀλλήλων –οις
item.field_greek_definition: (oblique cases plural only) one another, each other

item.title: φίλος φίλη φίλον
item.field_greek_semantic_group: Family and Friendship and the Home

item.field_greek_definition: meet, come to an agreement, correspond; happen, occur, come to pass; turn out in a certain way (+adv.), result
item.field_greek_semantic_group: Family and Friendship and the Home

item.title: πλέω, πλεύσομαι, ἔπλευσα, πέπλευκα, πέπλευσμαι, ἐπλεύσθην
τότε
item.field_greek_definition: then, at that time; οἱ τότε the men of that time (opp. οἱ νῦν)

item.title: χρή, impf. χρῆν or ἐχρῆν, infin. χρῆναι
item.field_greek_definition: it is necessary, it is fated, one ought (+infin. or +acc. and infin.)

item.title: δείκνυμι, δείξω, ἔδειξα, δέδειχα, δέδειγμαι, ἐδείχθην
τίθημι, θήσω, ἔθηκα, τέθηκα, τέθειμαι (but usu. κεῖμαι instead), ἐτέθην
item.field_greek_definition: to put, place; establish, ordain, institute; put in a certain state

item.title: εἶδον, 2 aor. of ὁράω, act. infin. ἰδεῖν, mid.infin. ἰδέσθαι
οἴομαι or οἶμαι, οἰήσομαι, impf. ᾤμην, aor. ᾠήθην
κινέω, κινήσω, ἐκίνησα, κεκίνηκα, κεκίνημαι, ἐκινήθην
πάσχω, πείσομαι, ἔπαθον, πέπονθα
item.field_greek_definition: suffer, experience, be affected in a certain way (+adv.)

item.title: ὅσπερ ἥπερ ὅπερ
item.field_greek_definition: the very one who, the very thing which

item.title: σύν
item.field_greek_definition: with (+ dat. of accompaniment or means)

item.title: μέλλω, μελλήσω, ἐμέλλησα
item.field_greek_definition: (+infin.) think of doing, intend to, be about to

item.title: πείθω, πείσω, ἔπεισα, πέποιθα, πέπεισμαι, ἐπείσθην
item.field_greek_definition: persuade, win over; (mid. and pass.) obey, believe in, trust in (+dat.)

item.title: πάρειμι
item.field_greek_definition: be present, be ready or at hand; (impers.) πάρεστί μοι it depends on me, it is in my power; τὰ παρόντα the present circumstances; τὸ παρόν just now

item.title: εἶδος εἴδους, τό
item.field_greek_definition: form, shape, figure; class, kind, sort

item.title: ὅπως
item.field_greek_definition: how, as; so that, in order that (+subj. or opt.)

item.title: νομίζω, νομιῶ, ἐνόμισα, νενόμικα, νενόμισμαι, ἐνομίσθην
item.field_greek_definition: think, believe that (+acc. and infin.); hold as a custom, be accustomed to (+infin.)

item.title: κύκλος κύκλου, ὁ
item.field_greek_definition: circle, ring, orb, disc, circular motion

item.title: πάθος πάθους, τό
item.field_greek_definition: incident, accident, misfortune, experience; passion, emotion; state, condition

item.title: ὀνομάζω, ὀνομάσω, ὠνόμασα, ὠνόμακα, ὠνόμασμαι, ὠνομάσθην
διαφέρω, διοίσω, 1 aor. διήνεγκα, 2 aor. διήνεγκον, διενήνοχα, διενήνεγμαι
item.field_greek_definition: carry in different ways, spread; differ; (impers.) διαφέρει it makes a difference to (+dat.)

item.title: μέχρι
item.field_greek_definition: until (conj.); as far as, up to (prep. +gen.)

item.title: εἶμι, infin. ἰέναι, ptc. ἰών, ἰοῦσα, ἰόν
οὐσία οὐσίας, ἡ
item.field_greek_semantic_group: Family and Friendship and the Home

item.title: ὕστερος ὑστέρα ὕστερον
item.field_greek_definition: coming after, following (+gen.); next, later; (adv.) ὕστερον afterwards

item.title: φυλάσσω, φυλάξω, ἐφύλαξα, πεφύλαχα, πεφύλαγμαι, ἐφυλάχθην
item.field_greek_definition: watch, guard, defend; (mid.) be on one’s guard against (+acc.)

item.title: οἰκέω, οἰκήσω, ᾤκησα, ᾤκηκα, ᾠκήθην
item.field_greek_semantic_group: Family and Friendship and the Home

item.title: παρέχω, παρέξω, παρέσχον, παρέσχηκα, impf. παρεῖχον
οἰκεῖος οἰκεία οἰκεῖον
item.field_greek_definition: domestic, of the house; one’s own; fitting, suitable
item.field_greek_semantic_group: Family and Friendship and the Home

item.title: κελεύω, κελεύσω, ἐκέλευσα, κεκέλευκα, κεκέλευσμαι, ἐκελεύσθην
ἡγέομαι, ἡγήσομαι, ἡγησάμην, ἥγημαι
item.field_greek_definition: lead, be the leader; regard, believe, think

item.title: ἀδελφός –οῦ, ὁ
item.field_greek_semantic_group: Family and Friendship and the Home

item.title: κεῖμαι, κείσομαι
item.field_greek_definition: to lie, be situated, be laid up in store, be set up, be established or ordained (used as pf. pass. of τίθημι)

item.title: χάρις χάριτος, ἡ
item.field_greek_definition: splendor, honor, glory; favor, goodwill, gratitude, thanks

item.title: κόσμος κόσμου, ὁ
item.field_greek_definition: order; ornament, decoration, adornment; world, universe

item.title: αἱρέω, αἱρήσω, 2 aor. εἷλον, ᾕρηκα, ᾕρημαι, ᾑρέθην
item.field_greek_definition: take, grasp, take by force; (mid.) choose

item.title: προστίθημι, προσθήσω, προσέθηκα, προστέθηκα, προστέθειμαι (but commonly προσκεῖμαι instead), προσετέθην
ἀξιόω, ἀξιώσω, ἠξίωσα, ἠξίωκα, ἠξίωμαι, ἠξιώθην
item.field_greek_definition: consider worthy; require, demand, ask, claim

item.title: ἔοικα, ptc. εἰκώς
item.field_greek_definition: be like, look like (+dat.); seem; befit

item.title: καθίστημι, καταστήσω, κατέστησα, κατέστην, καθέστηκα, plupf. καθειστήκη, κατεστάθην
item.field_greek_definition: set down, establish; bring into a certain state, render

item.title: καθίστημι, καταστήσω, κατέστησα, κατέστην, καθέστηκα, plupf. καθειστήκη, κατεστάθην
item.field_greek_definition: set down, establish; bring into a certain state, render

item.title: χρῆμα χρήματος, τό
item.field_greek_definition: thing, matter; (more commonly in pl.) goods or property, esp. money

item.title: πέμπω, πέμψω, ἔπεμψα, πέπομφα, πέπεμμαι, ἐπέμφθην
ἕνεκα
item.field_greek_definition: on account of, for the sake of (+gen.)

item.title: ἀπόλλυμι, ἀπολῶ, ἀπώλεσα, 2 aor. mid. ἀπωλόμην, pf. ἀπολώλεκα (“I have utterly destroyed”) or ἀπόλωλα (“I am undone”)
ἀποδίδωμι, ἀποδώσω, ἀπέδωκα, ἀποδέδωκα, ἀποδέδομαι, ἀπεδόθην
νοῦς, νοῦ, ὁ (other dialects: νόος, νόου, ὁ)
εὖ
item.field_greek_definition: well (opp. κακῶς); thoroughly, competently; happily, fortunately

item.title: κρίνω, κρινῶ, ἔκρινα, κέκρικα, κέκριμαι, ἐκρίθην
ἀναιρέω, ἀναιρήσω, ἀνεῖλον, ἀνῄρηκα, ἀνῄρημαι, ἀνῃρέθην
ἥκω, ἥξω, pf. ἧκα
item.field_greek_definition: I have come, I am present

item.title: μήτηρ μητρός, ἡ
item.field_greek_semantic_group: Family and Friendship and the Home

item.title: κρατέω, κρατήσω, ἐκράτησα, κεκράτηκα, κεκράτημαι, ἐκρατήθην
item.field_greek_definition: be victorious, conquer, rule, surpass, excel (+gen.)

item.title: ἥσσων ἧσσον
item.field_greek_definition: less, weaker (comp. of κακός or μικρός)

item.title: ἥσσων ἧσσον
item.field_greek_definition: less, weaker (comp. of κακός or μικρός)

item.title: οἶκος οἴκου, ὁ
item.field_greek_semantic_group: Family and Friendship and the Home

item.title: ἀφαιρέω, ἀφαιρήσω, ἀφεῖλον, ἀφῄρηκα, ἀφῄρημαι, ἀφῃρέθην
τύχη τύχης, ἡ
item.field_greek_definition: luck, fortune (good or bad), fate, chance

item.title: πιστεύω, πιστεύσω, ἐπίστευσα, πεπίστευκα, πεπίστευμαι, ἐπιστεύθην
διδάσκω, διδάξω, ἐδίδαξα, δεδίδαχα, δεδίδαγμαι, ἐδιδάχθην
τάσσω, τάξω, ἔταξα, τέταχα, τέταγμαι, ἐτάχθην

item.field_greek_semantic_group: Family and Friendship and the Home

item.title: τρέφω, θρέψω, ἔθρεψα, τέθραμμαι, ἐτράφην
item.field_greek_definition: nourish, feed, support, maintain; rear, educate

item.title: που
item.field_greek_definition: (enclitic) somewhere; I suppose, perhaps (to qualify an assertion)

item.title: κρείσσων κρεῖσσον
item.field_greek_definition: stronger, mightier; better, more excellent (comp. of ἀγαθός)

item.title: ἀφίημι, ἀφήσω, ἀφῆκα, ἀφεῖκα, ἀφεῖμαι, ἀφείθην
item.field_greek_definition: send away, let go; let alone, neglect

item.title: νικάω, νικήσω, ἐνίκησα, νενίκηκα, νενίκημαι, ἐνικήθην
ὁμολογέω, ὁμολογήσω, ὡμολόγησα, ὡμολόγηκα, ὡμολόγημαι, ὡμολογήθην
item.field_greek_definition: agree with, say the same thing as (+dat.)

item.title: αὖ, αὖθις
item.field_greek_definition: moreover; on the other hand; back (again)

item.title: τιμή τιμῆς, ἡ
item.field_greek_definition: honor, esteem; price, value; office, magistracy

item.title: μεταξύ
item.field_greek_definition: between (prep. + gen.); in the midst of (adv.)

item.title: προσήκω προσήξω
item.field_greek_definition: belong to, have to do with; be fitting for (+dat.); arrive at; οἱ προσήκοντες relatives; τὰ προσήκoντα duties

item.title: ἀδικέω, ἀδικήσω, ἠδίκησα, ἠδίκηκα, ἠδίκημαι, ἠδικήθην
στρατηγός –οῦ, ὁ
item.field_greek_definition: leader of an army, commander, general

item.title: παύω, παύσω, ἔπαυσα, πέπαυκα, πέπαυμαι, ἐπαύθην
item.field_greek_definition: stop, put an end to; (mid.) cease

item.title: τελευτάω, τελευτήσω, ἐτελεύτησα, τετελεύτηκα, τετελεύτημαι, ἐτελευτήθην
θυγάτηρ θυγατρός, ἡ
item.field_greek_semantic_group: Family and Friendship and the Home

item.title: οἰκία οἰκίας, ἡ
item.field_greek_semantic_group: Family and Friendship and the Home

item.title: παραδίδωμι, παραδώσω, παρέδωκα, παραδέδωκα, παραδέδομαι, παρεδόθην
ἐάω, ἐάσω, εἴασα
item.field_greek_definition: allow, permit (+acc. and infin.); let be, let alone

item.title: θαυμάζω, θαυμάσομαι, ἐθαύμασα, τεθαύμακα, τεθαύμασμαι, ἐθαυμάσθην
item.field_greek_definition: to be in awe (of), be astonished (at)
to be happy, rejoice at (+dat.), take joy in (+ptc.); χαῖρε, (pl.) χαίρετε hello, goodbye

item.title: τέκνον τέκνου, τό
item.field_greek_semantic_group: Family and Friendship and the Home

item.title: καταλαμβάνω, καταλήψομαι, κατέλαβον, κατείληφα, κατείλημμαι, κατελήφθην
item.field_greek_definition: seize, catch up with, arrest, compel

item.title: λύω, λύσω, ἔλυσα, λέλυκα, λέλυμαι, ἐλύθην
item.field_greek_definition: loosen, unbind, set free; undo, destroy

item.title: τιμάω, τιμήσω, ἐτίμησα, τετίμηκα, τετίμημαι, ἐτιμήθην
αἴρω, ἀρῶ, ἦρα, ἦρκα, ἦρμαι, ἤρθην
πότερος ποτέρα πότερον
item.field_greek_definition: which of the two? πότερον whether

item.title: κωλύω, κωλύσω, ἐκώλυσα, κεκώλυκα, κεκώλυμαι, ἐκωλύθην
ἁμαρτάνω, ἁμαρτήσομαι, ἡμάρτησα, 2 aor. ἥμαρτον, ἡμάρτηκα, ἡμάρτημαι, ἡμαρτήθην
item.field_greek_definition: miss the mark (+gen.); fail, be wrong, make a mistake

item.title: διαφθείρω, διαφθερῶ, διέφθειρα, διέφθαρκα, διέφθαρμαι, διεφθάρην
πως
item.field_greek_definition: (enclitic) somehow, in some way, in any way

item.title: πειράω (usually mid. πειράομαι), πειράσομαι, ἐπείρασα, πεπείραμαι, ἐπειράθην
item.field_greek_definition: attempt, try, make a trial of (+gen.)
put to flight; (mid. and pass.) flee, fear

item.title: βάλλω, βαλῶ, 2 aor. ἔβαλον, βέβληκα, βέβλημαι, ἐβλήθην
item.field_greek_definition: throw, hurl; throw at, hit (acc.) with (dat.)

item.title: συμφέρω, συνοίσω, 1 aor. συνήνεγκα
item.field_greek_definition: benefit, be useful or profitable to (+dat.); (impers.) συμφέρει it is of use, expedient (+infin.); τὸ συμφέρον use, profit, advantage

item.title: τέμνω, τεμῶ, 2 aor. ἔτεμον, -τέτμηκα, τέτμημαι, ἐτμήθην
item.field_greek_definition: cut, cut down, cut to pieces

item.title: πίστις πίστεως, ἡ
item.field_greek_definition: trust in others, faith; that which gives confidence, assurance, pledge, guarantee

item.title: ὑπολαμβάνω, ὑπολήψομαι, ὑπέλαβον, ὑπείληφα, ὑπείλημμαι, ὑπελήφθην
item.field_greek_definition: take up, seize; answer, reply; assume, suppose

item.title: λανθάνω, λήσω, ἔλαθον, λέληθα
item.field_greek_definition: escape the notice of (+acc. and nom. participle), be unknown; (mid. and pass.) forget

item.title: πάντως
item.field_greek_definition: altogether, in all ways; at any rate
carry; (mid. and pass) go, walk, march
separate, set apart, choοse; (mid.) answer, reply

item.title: κατηγορέω, κατηγορήσω, κατηγόρησα, κατηγόρηκα, κατηγόρημαι, κατηγορήθην
τρέπω, τρέψω, ἔτρεψα, τέτροφα, ἐτράπην
item.field_greek_definition: turn, direct towards a thing; put to flight, defeat; (pass.) turn one’s steps in a certain direction, go

item.title: λείπω, λείψω, ἔλιπον, λέλοιπα, λέλειμμαι, ἐλείφθην
βουλή βουλῆς, ἡ
item.field_greek_definition: will, determination; counsel, piece of advice; council of elders

item.title: τίκτω, τέξω or τέξομαι, ἔτεκον, τέτοκα, τέτεγμαι, ἐτέχθην
item.field_greek_semantic_group: Family and Friendship and the Home

item.title: κομίζω, κομιῶ, ἐκόμισα, κεκόμικα, κεκόμισμαι, ἐκομίσθην
στάδιον σταδίου, τό (pl. στάδια and στάδιοι)
item.field_greek_definition: stadion or stade, the longest Greek unit of linear measure, about 185 meters

item.title: φρονέω, φρονήσω, ἐφρόνησα
item.field_greek_definition: think, intend to (+infin.); be minded towards (+adv. and dat.)

item.title: τοιόσδε τοιάδε τοιόνδε
item.field_greek_definition: such (as this), of such a sort (as this)

item.title: ὁρμάω, ὁρμήσω, ὥρμησα, ὥρμηκα, ὥρμημαι, ὡρμήθην
item.field_greek_definition: set in motion, urge on; (intrans.) start, hasten on

item.title: δράω, δράσω, ἔδρασα, δέδρακα, δέδραμαι, ἐδράσθην
σκοπέω, σκοπήσω, ἐσκόπησα
item.field_greek_definition: look at, watch; look into, consider, examine

item.title: γράμμα γράμματος, τό
item.field_greek_definition: letter, written character; (pl.) piece of writing, document(s)

item.title: θύω, θύσω, ἔθυσα, τέθυκα, τέθυμαι, ἐτύθην
ὧδε
item.field_greek_definition: thus, in this way; hither, here

item.title: ἁλίσκομαι, ἁλώσομαι, 2 aor. ἑάλων, ἑάλωκα
item.field_greek_definition: to be taken, conquered (act. supplied by αἱρέω)

item.title: ἀμείνων ἄμεινον
item.field_greek_definition: better, abler, stronger, braver (comp. of ἀγαθός)

item.title: ἀπαλλάσσω, ἀπαλλάξω, ἀπήλλαξα, ἀπήλλαχα, ἀπήλλαγμαι, ἀπηλλάχθην or ἀπηλλάγην
βουλεύω βουλεύσω, ἐβούλευσα, βεβούλευκα, βεβούλευμαι, ἐβουλεύθην
αἰτέω, αἰτήσω, ᾔτησα, ᾔτηκα, ᾔτημαι, ᾐτήθην
οὐκοῦν
item.field_greek_definition: surely then (inviting assent to an inference)

item.title: τολμάω, τολμήσω, ἐτόλμησα, τετόλμηκα, τετόλμημαι, ἐτολμήθην
item.field_greek_definition: have the courage, dare; undertake, undergo

item.title: εἰκός εἰκότος, τό
item.field_greek_definition: likelihood, probability; εἰκός (ἐστι) it is likely (+infin.) →ἔοικα

item.title: μυρίος μυρία μυρίον
item.field_greek_definition: countless; μύριοι 10,000; μυριάς -άδος ἡ 10,000, a countless amount

item.title: περ
item.field_greek_definition: [enclitic added to pronouns and other particles for emphasis]

item.title: φράζω, φράσω, ἔφρασα, πέφρακα, πέφρασμαι, ἐφράσθην
ἀγγέλλω, ἀγγελῶ, ἤγγειλα, ἤγγελκα, ἤγγελμαι, ἠγγέλθην
